name: Bingo Smash - Lucky Bingo Travel
description:
- Enjoy different Bingo rooms around the world
- Compete with worldwide Bingo players
- Play Bingo with our cute and incredible mascots
- Use special power ups and boosts to get more Bingos
- Tons of special Bingo game plays
- Go up levels and win more Bingo prizes
- Complete kinds of Bingo puzzles and get rewards
- Lots of Bingo achievements to challenge
- Get bonus Bingo ticket and increase your daily bonus

SUPPORT
If you have any doubts or problems with the game, just send an email to bingo@prosorte.com

A brand new Bingo World and Party is waiting for you! Thanks for your playing and have a wonderful Blitz bingo world tour!
